A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was certified shit. Rose's subplot added nothing to the movie\, you could have cut her scenes entirely\, and the plot would be completely unaffected. Luke's character was absolutely obliterated. The movie also teased Kylo and Rey's transition to opposite sides of the force only to cop out\, making them weaker antagonists and protagonists respectively. On the whole a step back for star wars\, at least we can ignore the prequels\, but this is a very scary direction for star wars.
